content.p: Our Volunteering Careers Fair is a brilliant opportunity to meet students interested in volunteering locally, engaging in overseas options and showcase your organisation. If you are a registered charity with volunteering opportunities available, our jobs fair is the ideal event to engage with our students who want to give back to the community. Tuesday 11 February 2025 11.30am - 2pm Portland Building, University Park Please contact the recruiter services team to book your place at the fair. Price: Free If you have any questions please contact the Recruiter Services team. Recruiter Services telephone: +44 (0) 115 82 32233 fax: +44 (0) 115 951 3679 email: recruiterservices@nottingham.ac.uk
